chart_metadata.name: palworld
chart_metadata.description: Palworld is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you befriend and collect mysterious creatures called "Pals".

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Palworld is able to change file ownership.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Palworld is able to bypass file read, write, and execute permission checks.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Palworld is able to bypass permission checks on operations that normally require the file system UID of the process to match the UID of the file.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Palworld is able to set the setuid attribute on a file.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Palworld is able to set the setgid attribute on a file.

capabilities.name: SYS_RESOURCE
capabilities.description: Palworld is able to override resource limits.

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: Palworld is able to send signals to processes owned by others.

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Palworld.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6
